page.title: 09GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {T.V. PROGRAMMES} One person is chosen and the others have to line up. The announcer says the initials, time and day the programme is on. The others run to the caller and back and shout the answer out. {FIREWORKS Someone faces a wall the rest face her back some distance away, they try to creep up and tig her. She looks around, if she sees someone move they join her. If someone tigs her the last one to the wall is on. {DODGE-BALL} Two people are on at each end and all the rest are in the middle. The people on throw the ball, the others dodge it but if hit they are out. If they catch the ball 3 times a person can come back but if they miss they are out.
